name: DealVelocityTrendChart
functionalRequirements:
## Trend Chart Sub-component

### Purpose
Displays historical trends of deal velocity across stages over time.

### Core Features
- Line chart showing velocity trends
- Multiple stage series
- Smooth line rendering
- Interactive tooltips with rounded values
- Clickable data points
- Customizable time range
- Focus on series functionality

dataRequirements.description: Receives calculated trend data from parent component

technicalDesign:
## Implementation

### Chart Library
- Uses ECharts for rendering
- Line chart with smooth curves
- Manages chart lifecycle
- Proper disposal on unmount

### Data Processing
- Receives pre-calculated trend data
- Formats tooltips with rounded values
- Handles click events for drill-down

properties.name: onDrillDown
properties.description: Callback when clicking on chart elements

properties.name: timeRange
properties.description: Number of days to show in trend
